defaultBrowser.screenTitle.title: Default Browser
defaultBrowser.screenTitle.note: Heading for the default browser settings section

defaultBrowser.off_opt.title: Off
defaultBrowser.off_opt.note: Option indicating that the default browser setting is turned off

defaultBrowser.ddg_not_default.title: DuckDuckGo is not your default browser.
defaultBrowser.ddg_not_default.note: Notification message indicating that DuckDuckGo is not set as the default browser

defaultBrowser.make_ddg_default.title: Make DuckDuckGo Default...
defaultBrowser.make_ddg_default.note: Button text to set DuckDuckGo as the default browser

defaultBrowser.shortcuts_head.title: Shortcuts
defaultBrowser.shortcuts_head.note: Heading for the shortcuts settings section

defaultBrowser.ddg_not_in_dock.title: DuckDuckGo is not added to the Dock.
defaultBrowser.ddg_not_in_dock.note: Notification message indicating that DuckDuckGo is not added to the Dock

defaultBrowser.add_to_dock.title: Add to Dock...
defaultBrowser.add_to_dock.note: Button text to add DuckDuckGo to the Dock
